attributes.action: stealing NHS care by non EU nationals should be made a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: Every yr 10,000s of non-EU nationals fly in2 our airports getting taxis direct 2 A&E 2 have babies where they know its not a standard birth. Also theyll turn up in A&E with advanced cancer 2 steal NHS resources resulting in sched  opps bein cancelled . Pregnancy shud b ez 2 solve by HMRC officers 2 request proof of  insurance & when none held they shud b  deported. The average cost 2 the NHS bein £50,000+ per thief with trusts near airports cing  more people NOT entitled 2 NHS care then are. PC has caused this & its getting worse. Theres no deterant at the mo as scum after treatment leave be4 bein invoiced & r on their way home b4 the trust r aware. They steal millions worth of NHS care without a care 2 the GB public who have 2 pick up the bill. This crime shud b made in2 a criminal offence like robbing is so the culprits can b brought back 2 the UK. Unless theres a deterant this will continue its getting worse we have a national not international service.

rejection.details: Please see: NHS Foreign Nationals treatment payment
